name: Shil.me
intro: Lightweight and interactive NFT display platform
introduce: Shil.me is The first Web3 Linktree for the digital asset collectors. Shil.me is building a simple, lightweight, and elegant link-in-bio solution where people can display, share, transact and manage not just their NFTs, but digital assets from all across the Web3 ecosystem, serving as their Web3 homepage.
